original_title: Don’t Call It Road Rap - A Noisey Film
overview: After 'Skepta: Top Boy' and 'Noisey Blackpool' comes our latest UK documentary - Don’t Call It Road Rap hosted by legend of UK music, Mike Skinner.  'Don’t Call It Road Rap' was filmed around London over a year, investigating the explosion of UK rap and follows some of the most important MCs as they try to focus on music and keep their lives on a positive track.  The film features the likes of Section Boyz, C Biz, 67, Corleone, Potter Payper and Skore Beezy.
title: Don’t Call It Road Rap - A Noisey Film
